description: 1=Yes if Y to any of the following: heartattack_ynd, congestive_hf_ynd, coronary_ynd, atheroscl_ynd, pacemaker_ynd, angioplasty_ynd, coronary_bypass_ynd, coronary_artery_stent, other_heart_surgery (including   cardiac conversion, heart catheter, cardiac ablation, abdominal aortic repair, open heart surgery, defibrillation)
